languages.text: "Я не смею противиться твоей воле и смиренно принимаю приговор. То, что мне удалось ступить внутрь сей обители и лицезреть великого духа, пусть и скоротечно, — уже великое благо. Да прервется Цикл!"

"I dare not oppose your will and humbly accept your sentence. That I was given the chance to set foot inside this abode and behold a great spirit, however briefly, is already a great blessing. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"
languages.original_text: "Я не смею противиться твоей воле и смиренно принимаю приговор. То, что мне удалось ступить внутрь сей обители и лицезреть великого духа, пусть и скоротечно, — уже великое благо. Да прервется Цикл!"

traits.locale_text: "I dare not oppose your will and humbly accept your sentence. That I was given the chance to set foot inside this abode and behold a great spirit, however briefly, is already a great blessing. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Ich wage es nicht, mich Eurem Willen zu widersetzen und nehme Euer Urteil demütig an. Dass ich die Gelegenheit hatte, hierher zu kommen und – wenn auch nur kurz – einen mächtigen Geist zu erblicken, ist bereits ein großer Segen. Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde!"
languages.original_text: "I dare not oppose your will and humbly accept your sentence. That I was given the chance to set foot inside this abode and behold a great spirit, however briefly, is already a great blessing. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich wage es nicht, mich Eurem Willen zu widersetzen und nehme Euer Urteil demütig an. Dass ich die Gelegenheit hatte, hierher zu kommen und – wenn auch nur kurz – einen mächtigen Geist zu erblicken, ist bereits ein großer Segen. Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde!"
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Je n'ose pas m'opposer à votre volonté ni à votre sentence, que j'accepte humblement. Je peux déjà m'estimer béni d'avoir eu la chance de monter à bord de ce vaisseau et d'y rencontrer un grand esprit, quoique brièvement. Que le Cycle soit rompu ! »
languages.original_text: "I dare not oppose your will and humbly accept your sentence. That I was given the chance to set foot inside this abode and behold a great spirit, however briefly, is already a great blessing. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ose pas m'opposer à votre volonté ni à votre sentence, que j'accepte humblement. Je peux déjà m'estimer béni d'avoir eu la chance de monter à bord de ce vaisseau et d'y rencontrer un grand esprit, quoique brièvement. Que le Cycle soit rompu ! »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «No osaré oponerme a su voluntad: acepto su sentencia. Haber tenido la ocasión de entrar en este recinto y presenciar a un gran espíritu, aun por escasos momentos, ya es una gran bendición. ¡Que se interrumpa el Ciclo!».
languages.original_text: "I dare not oppose your will and humbly accept your sentence. That I was given the chance to set foot inside this abode and behold a great spirit, however briefly, is already a great blessing. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: «No osaré oponerme a su voluntad: acepto su sentencia. Haber tenido la ocasión de entrar en este recinto y presenciar a un gran espíritu, aun por escasos momentos, ya es una gran bendición. ¡Que se interrumpa el Ciclo!».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「あなたの意志に背かず、謹んで刑を受け入れよう。この場所に足を踏み入れ、偉大な精霊を目にする機会に恵まれたことは、たとえわずかな時間でも、すでに大いなる祝福だ。サイクルを断ち切れ！」
languages.original_text: "I dare not oppose your will and humbly accept your sentence. That I was given the chance to set foot inside this abode and behold a great spirit, however briefly, is already a great blessing. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの意志に背かず、謹んで刑を受け入れよう。この場所に足を踏み入れ、偉大な精霊を目にする機会に恵まれたことは、たとえわずかな時間でも、すでに大いなる祝福だ。サイクルを断ち切れ！」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “我不敢违背您的意志，我愿意虔敬地接受您的判决。尽管时间很短暂，但我能有机会踏入这间圣所，亲眼目睹那位伟大的机魂，这已经是无法言喻的至福了。让循环终止吧！”
languages.original_text: "I dare not oppose your will and humbly accept your sentence. That I was given the chance to set foot inside this abode and behold a great spirit, however briefly, is already a great blessing. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: “我不敢违背您的意志，我愿意虔敬地接受您的判决。尽管时间很短暂，但我能有机会踏入这间圣所，亲眼目睹那位伟大的机魂，这已经是无法言喻的至福了。让循环终止吧！”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "İradenize karşı çıkmaya cüret etmeyip uygun gördüğünüz cezaya boyun eğeceğim. Bu meskene ayak basıp yüce ruha tanıklık etmek, başlı başına bir lütuftu. Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun!"
languages.original_text: "I dare not oppose your will and humbly accept your sentence. That I was given the chance to set foot inside this abode and behold a great spirit, however briefly, is already a great blessing. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: "İradenize karşı çıkmaya cüret etmeyip uygun gördüğünüz cezaya boyun eğeceğim. Bu meskene ayak basıp yüce ruha tanıklık etmek, başlı başına bir lütuftu. Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun!"
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
